about:
I'd say I'm highly motivated, dynamic, persevering, patient, rigorous and passionate with everything that comes along with programming.


No matter the teamwork project I work on, I'm mostly in the backend side, but my friends say I'm not bad at design. Although lacking a bit of experience, I participated in various projects about different topics especially commerce, and on good terms with many different types of people.
motivations:
Nowadays, the IT sector is booming. Exciting times are ahead of us, as long as you are even slightly talented, you'll be respected in society with a relatively high salary.


I really love this industry, especially the field of machine learning, it have a LOT of potential to unearth, so I'm really excited for the future.

projects.title: Person recognizer by voice
projects.description: A project that I made on machine learning. You record your voice, it remembers it and whenever you speak later, it'll recognize you. Actually, it's much more complicated than that.

projects.title: Daily voice summary
projects.description: The application that I won a competition with. Created to reduce your daily scrolling. Depending on what you say, it'll make an API call and give you what you need.

projects.title: Weather website
projects.description: Calls a weather API and designs an actual scenery of the current weather situation. Feel free to check it out!

projects.title: My portfolio
projects.description: An exciting project, created using a NextJS. This was also my first interaction with React.

projects.title: Certifications website
projects.description: Scrapes certification exams PDFs from gratisexam and provides a way to take the test online.

projects.title: E-commerce website
projects.description: For my first big project, my father proposed to me to create a commercial website for him to sell his products online for bigger customer base. Made with native PHP CSS and HTML.

projects.title: Novel Reader website
projects.description: My favourite project. Scrapes novels from boxnovel, saving them and allows the user to read his novels while saving his progress and allowing him to bookmark his favourite quotes.

projects.title: Glossary
projects.description: A website, meant to be online using Firebase, created in order to store my unorganised definitions by #tags and such. I also tried to implement stackoverflow text editor.

projects.title: Commercial Management application
projects.description: One day, I found that my father's shop was managed by an expensive application, which lacked a lot of fonctionalities. So I decided to create one myself. No source code.

projects.title: Shop Organizer
projects.description: A tool created to organize a shop I worked at before.

projects.title: Puissance4
projects.description: A game meant to be played by two. Created using JavaFX.
